text: Guitar Town is the debut studio album by Steve Earle. It was released on 5 March 1986 through MCA records. It went to number 89 in the United States and number 82 in Canada and was nominated for 2 Grammy Awards in 1987. In 2012, it was ranked #482 on the Rolling Stone 500 Greatest Albums of All Time. ==Track listing== All songs written by Steve Earle unless otherwise noted ==References== Category:1986 albums Category:Debut albums
title: Guitar Town
